) } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { admin: state.authentication.user, allUsers: state.users.allUsers, loading: state.users.loading, error: state.users.error, selectedUser:state.users.selectedUser } }; const mapDispatchToProps = { login: authActions.login, logout: authActions.logout, getAllUsers: userActions.getAllUsers, selectUser: userActions.selectUser, }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(AdminPage)
